::Spitfire::
"If you are a Maximal, then I shall join."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> *Kamodia hears Spitfire on her Commlink* Kamodia: You wish to join 
us?
> *Kamodia says into her Commlink to Spitfire. Kamodia runs outside 
the base*
> Kamodia: Do you wish to join us? *Kamodia calls out to Spitfire*
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 2:33 PM
> Subject: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> > ::Spitfire::
> >
> > She slithered along.  Her tongue picking up the scent of maximals.
> > She kept going untill she reached her destination.  It may have 
taken
> > her  awhile to get there.  She transformed into bot mode.  She had
> > her hood open shielding her head from the sun. She walked to the
> > entrance.  She saw no one about.  She stuck her tongue out and 
tasted
> > the air.  She could tell the battle faught there was a grusome 
one.
> >
> > She opened her link, "Hello, is any maximal still alive in there?"
> >
